attributes.action: A second Scottish referendum for independence.
attributes.additional_details: So I am requesting the government to follow what the SNP wants and hold a second Scottish referendum for Scottish independence.
attributes.background: Throughout the Brexit debates, I have personally watched and listened to Ian Blackford and the other SNP members, rant and rave about what Scottish people want and they say and I quote Mr Blackford "won't let this house drag Scotland out of the EU and we want to be an independent state of the EU"
